nctu.fintech.appmate

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • nctu.fintech.appmate.Table

  • public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
    資料表連接器。

    Class Table represent a table on an appmate server.

    For develops whom use the database without authentication, frequency request would trigger CSRF protection of the database. To resolve this issue a CSRF token is required but currently it is not provided and is not implemented in this client library. If frequently usage of non-authenticated database is required and reasonable, please contact the manager.

    It should be noted that most of methods in Table create a network connection but it doesn't handle the threading. Due to Android's policy, developers should avoid any network progress run on main thread. You can avoid NetworkOnMainThreadException by using AsyncTask or Thread. See Android API Guides: Processes and Threads.

      • get

        public Tuple[] get(java.lang.String... filters)
            throws java.io.IOException
        使用篩選器取得物件。

        Get items by filter.

        This method can parse natural mathematical expressions into query parameters. See the following filter writing rules:

        • Full match (type: String)
          use = or ==
          notice that quote is not allowed, or it will be parsed into part of matching string. i.e.
          stringField=matching string with whitespace
          stringField == matching_string_without_whitespace
        • Exact equals (type: Integer, Boolean)
          use = or ==
          i.e. integerField=100, boolField==0
        • Inequality (type: Integer, Float, Double)
          support symbols: >, >=, <, <=
          i.e. floatField > 5.00, integerField<=99

        Notice that all filters is giving as String type, numeric and logical types should converted to string type before assigned.

        This method supports multiple filter querying, the result will be the intersection of given rules. To set multiple filters use commas to separate each rule. i.e. get("stringField=Hello", "integerField>=99");

        Parameters:
        filters - filter rules
        Returns:
        items match specified rules, or null on error
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - table not exist or network error
        android.os.NetworkOnMainThreadException - if this method is called on main thread

      • add

        public void add(Tuple... items)
         throws java.io.IOException
        新增物件到資料表中。

        Add an item into the table.

        Parameters:

      • update

        public void update(int id,
                   Tuple item,
                   boolean overwrite)
            throws java.io.IOException
        更新一個資料表上的項目。

        Update an item on the table.

        This method is the full version of update function. For convenient usage, use other alias instead.

        Parameters:
        id - item id to be updated.
        item - data to be updated.
        overwrite - overwrite or not. If TRUE, all fields will be cleared and re-upload. If FALSE, only fields which is in item will be updated. NOTICE that all non-nullable field is required if overwrite is TRUE, default is false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - table/item not exist or network error
        android.os.NetworkOnMainThreadException - if this method is called on main thread

      • update

        public void update(Tuple item)
            throws java.io.IOException
        更新一個資料表上的項目。

        本方法為 update(int, Tuple, boolean) 之短版API，其使用參數為更新第 Tuple.getId() 個項目。

        Update an item on the table. This method will update the Tuple.getId()-th item on the table.

        Parameters:
        item - item to be updated
        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - if item id not specified
        java.io.IOException - table/item not exist or network error
        android.os.NetworkOnMainThreadException - if this method is called on main thread
        See Also:
        update(int, Tuple, boolean)

      • delete

        public boolean delete(int... ids)
               throws java.io.IOException
        刪除一些項目。

        Delete an item on the table.

        Parameters:
        ids - id of items to be deleted
        Returns:
        operation success or not
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - table/item not exist or network error
        android.os.NetworkOnMainThreadException - if this method is called on main thread
